divs: Sighting DetailsI prefer to remain anonymous at this time, and do not mind being contacted via email. I was driving on the north loop by tractor supply. To me left, high enough to be a plane, I saw yellow lights. The color was yellow the entire time. I saw about 6 lights on this side, it was shaped like a disc. The lights were rotating around the disc. This is what made me think it as not a plane due to the rotation. Then no lights. Moments later the lights were blinking randomly. The lights then disappeared for good. I notice two other cars pulled over watching as well. It was moving slowly.
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
